articles.author: Austen Goslin
articles.title: Andrew Garfield stars in the Under the Banner of Heaven trailer for Hulu - Polygon
articles.description: Under the Banner of Heaven is a new true crime series staring Andrew Garfield as a Utah detective whose investigation leads him to the church and his own faith. The series premieres on Hulu and FX on April 28.
articles.content: The limited series begins on April 28 on FX and Hulu
